public class TestStop implements Runnable {
    //1ã€è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡è¯†ä½
    private volatile boolean flag = true;

    @Override
    public void run() {
        int i = 0;
        //2ã€çº¿ç¨‹ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦
        while (flag) {
            System.out.println("run...Thread" + i++);
        }

    //3ã€è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªå…¬å¼€çš„æ–¹æ³•åœæ­¢çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œè½¬æ¢æ ‡è¯†ä½
    public void stop() {
        this.flag = false;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        TestStop testStop = new TestStop();
        new Thread(testStop).start();
        
        for (int i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
            System.out.println("main" + i);
            if (i == 150) {
                //è°ƒç”¨stopï¼ˆï¼‰æ–¹æ³•åœæ­¢çº¿ç¨‹
                testStop.stop();
                System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹åœæ­¢äº†");

    }
}

public class TestJoin implements Runnable {

  • å¹¶å‘ï¼šåŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡è¢«å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åŒæ—¶æ“ä½œï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šå¼•èµ·èµ„æºå†²çª

public class UnsafeBuyTicket {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        BuyTicket station = new BuyTicket();
        new Thread(station, "é‚“æ†¨æ†¨").start();
        new Thread(station, "å¤œåä¸ƒ").start();
        new Thread(station, "é»„å¡ä¸½").start();
    }
}

class BuyTicket implements Runnable {
    private int tickets = 10;
    boolean flag = true;//å¤–éƒ¨åœæ­¢çº¿ç¨‹æ–¹æ³•

    @Override
    public void run() {
        //ä¹°ç¥¨
        while (flag) {
            try {
                buy();
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
    //synchronized åŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³• é”çš„æ˜¯this.tickets
    private synchronized void buy() throws InterruptedException {
        if (tickets <= 0) {
            flag = false;
            return;
        }
        Thread.sleep(100);
        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "æ‹¿åˆ°äº†ç¥¨" + tickets--);
    }
}

 2. åŒæ­¥å—

public class UnsafeBank {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Account account = new Account(100,"ç»“å©šåŸºé‡‘");
        Drawing you = new Drawing(account,50,"you");
        Drawing me = new Drawing(account,100,"me");
        you.start();
        me.start();
    }
}
//è´¦æˆ·ç±»
class Account {
    int money;
    String name;

    public Account(int money, String name) {
        this.money = money;
        this.name = name;
    }
}
//å–é’±ç±»
class Drawing extends Thread {
    Account account;
    int drawingMoney;//å–å‡ºå¤šå°‘é’±
    int nowMoney;    //æ‰‹ä¸­çš„é’±

    public Drawing(Account account, int drawingMoney, String name) {
        super(name);
        this.account = account;
        this.drawingMoney = drawingMoney;
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        //åŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³•å—ï¼Œé»˜è®¤é”this
        synchronized (account) {
            if (account.money - drawingMoney < 0) {
                System.out.println("è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸è¶³");
                return;
            }
            try {
                Thread.sleep(1000);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            account.money -= drawingMoney;
            nowMoney += drawingMoney;
            System.out.println(this.getName() + "æ‰‹é‡Œçš„é’±" + nowMoney);
            System.out.println(account.name + "è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼š" + account.money);
        }
    }
}
  • æ­»é”
    å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å„è‡ªå æœ‰ä¸€äº›å…±äº«èµ„æºï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”äº’ç›¸ç­‰å¾…å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹å æœ‰çš„èµ„æºæ‰èƒ½è¿è¡Œï¼Œè€Œå¯¼è‡´ä¸¤ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹éƒ½åœ¨ç­‰å¾…å¯¹æ–¹èµ„æºï¼Œéƒ½åœæ­¢æ‰§è¡Œçš„æƒ…å½¢ã€‚å³æŸä¸€ä¸ªåŒæ­¥å—åŒæ—¶æ‹¥æœ‰â€œä¸¤ä¸ªä»¥ä¸Šå¯¹è±¡çš„é”â€æ—¶ã€‚
public class DeadLock {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        MakeUp m1 = new MakeUp(0, "é‚“æ†¨æ†¨");
        MakeUp m2 = new MakeUp(1, "é»„å¡ä¸½");
        m1.start();
        m2.start();
    }
}

//å£çº¢
class Lipstick {
}

//é•œå­
class Mirror {
}

class MakeUp extends Thread {
    static Lipstick lipstick = new Lipstick();
    static Mirror mirror = new Mirror();
    int choice;
    String name;

    MakeUp(int choice, String name) {
        this.choice = choice;
        this.name = name;
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        try {
            makeup();
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public void makeup() throws InterruptedException {
        if (choice == 0) {
            synchronized (lipstick) {
                System.out.println(name + "è·å¾—å£çº¢çš„é”");
                Thread.sleep(1000);
                synchronized (mirror) {
                    System.out.println(name + "è·å¾—é•œå­çš„é”");
                }
            }

        } else {
            synchronized (mirror) {
                System.out.println(name + "è·å¾—é•œå­çš„é”");
                Thread.sleep(2000);
                synchronized (lipstick) {
                    System.out.println(name + "è·å¾—å£çº¢çš„é”");
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
  • locké”ï¼šæ˜¯æ˜¾å¼é”
public class TestLock {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        BuyTickets station = new BuyTickets();
        new Thread(station, "é‚“æ†¨æ†¨").start();
        new Thread(station, "å¤œåä¸ƒ").start();
        new Thread(station, "é»„å¡ä¸½").start();
    }
}

class BuyTickets implements Runnable {
    private int tickets = 10;
    boolean flag = true;//å¤–éƒ¨åœæ­¢çº¿ç¨‹æ–¹æ³•
    //å®šä¹‰é”
    private final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
    @Override
    public void run() {
        //ä¹°ç¥¨
        while (flag) {
            try {
                //åŠ é”
                lock.lock();
                buy();
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                //è§£é”
                lock.unlock();
            }
        }
    }

    private void buy() throws InterruptedException {
        if (tickets <= 0) {
            flag = false;
            return;
        }
        Thread.sleep(100);
        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "æ‹¿åˆ°äº†ç¥¨" + tickets--);
    }
}

çº¿ç¨‹æ± 

  • çº¿ç¨‹æ± å†…éƒ¨ç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ç»„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é«˜æ•ˆæ‰§è¡Œå¤§é‡å°ä»»åŠ¡
  • Executorsæä¾›äº†é™æ€æ–¹æ³•åˆ›å»ºä¸åŒç±»å‹çš„ExecutorService
  • å¿…é¡»è°ƒç”¨shutdown()å…³é—­ExecutorService
import java.util.concurrent.*;

public class TestPool {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ± 
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(4);

        //æ‰§è¡Œ
        for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
            service.submit(new MyThreads());
        }
        //å…³é—­é“¾æ¥
        service.shutdown();
    }
}

class MyThreads implements Runnable{
    @Override
    public void run() {
        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName());
    }
}
